full_summary:
### Draftsperson/Illustrator (Senior) Requirement

**Reference Number**: W8485-TSPS2022-14
**Publication Date**: October 24, 2022
**Deadline**: November 8, 2022, at 14:00 EST

**Background**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites pre-qualified suppliers to bid on the requirement for one (1) Draftsperson/Illustrator (Senior) under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply. This requirement falls under the Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) category.

**Work Location**
The selected supplier will be required to perform work at 17 Wing Winnipeg, Manitoba, or a mutually agreed upon location.

**Security Clearance**
The supplier must hold a Secret security clearance.

**Bid Requirements**
The bid documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) package, will be sent directly to pre-qualified suppliers. The RFP package is not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GC Bid).

**Services Required**
The DND requires the professional services of one (1) Senior Draftsperson/Illustrator to provide expertise in instrument procedure design, including both domestic and foreign terminal instrument procedures (FTIP), advice, and management services connected to the planning, design, construction, and maintenance of instrument procedures for the Canadian Armed Forces.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers**
The following companies are pre-qualified for this requirement:

* 9468269 Canada Corp.
* ACF Associates Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* AECOM Canada Ltd.
* AES ENGINEERING LTD.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Fleetway Inc.
* L-3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Maverin Business Services Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc.
* Olav Consulting Corp.
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* Platinum Technologies Inc.
* Procom Consultants Group Ltd.
* Promaxis Systems Inc
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* QinetiQ Group Canada Inc.
* T.E.S. Contract Services INC.
* T.I.7 INC.
* The Source Staffing Solutions INC.
* Thomas & Schmidt Inc.
* Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.
* Wood Canada Limited
* WSP Canada Inc.

**Contact Information**
For any inquiries
